myschedule.quartz.extra.util

Class ProcessUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • myschedule.quartz.extra.util.ProcessUtils

  • public class ProcessUtils
extends Object
    Utilities to help run external sub-process, and external java process that has the same classpath setup as the one started the parent JVM.

    Note that if process has timeout, it is destroyed. In case of JVM sub process, it will not invoke shutdown hook!

    Author:
    Zemian Deng

    • Method Detail

      • runInBackground

        public static ProcessUtils.BackgroundProcess runInBackground(String[] commandArguments,
                                             ProcessUtils.LineAction lineAction)
        Run an external command and read STDOUT and STDERR from the sub-process and process each line from output.

        This method will NOT block caller and return Process object after it started the command.

        Parameters:
        commandArguments - External command and arguments
        lineAction - A action processing each output line.
        Returns:
        exitCode - the external program exit code if it completed successfully.
        Throws:
        ProcessUtils.TimeoutException - - if timeout >=0 and has reached it.

      • run

        public static int run(long timeout,
      String[] commandArguments,
      ProcessUtils.LineAction lineAction)
        Run an external command and read STDOUT and STDERR from the sub-process and process each line from output.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        You may set an timeout value to ensure sub-process will terminate after certain milliseconds. A timeout value of <= 0 will be ignored and run as long as the sub-process will take. If timeout is set, and exceeded, it will throw an RuntimeException.

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds if external command did not return.
        commandArguments - External command and arguments
        lineAction - A action processing each output line.
        Returns:
        exitCode - the external program exit code if it completed successfully.
        Throws:
        ProcessUtils.TimeoutException - - if timeout >=0 and has reached it.

      • run

        public static int run(long timeout,
      long timeoutCheckInterval,
      String[] commandArguments,
      ProcessUtils.LineAction lineAction)
        Run an external command and read STDOUT and STDERR from the sub-process and process each line from output.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        You may set an timeout value to ensure sub-process will terminate after certain milliseconds. A timeout value of <= 0 will be ignored and run as long as the sub-process will take. If timeout is set, and exceeded, it will throw an RuntimeException.

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds if external command did not return.
        timeoutCheckInterval - if timeout > 0, then this will set pausing interval in millis to check for timeout/process completion.
        commandArguments - External command and arguments
        lineAction - A action processing each output line.
        Returns:
        exitCode - the external program exit code if it completed successfully.
        Throws:
        ProcessUtils.TimeoutException - - if timeout >=0 and has reached it.

      • run

        public static List<String> run(long timeout,
               String... commandArguments)
        Run an external command and read STDOUT and STDERR from the sub-process and return the output as List of String.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        You may set an timeout value to ensure sub-process will terminate after certain milliseconds. A timeout value of <= 0 will be ignored and run as long as the sub-process will take. If timeout is set, and exceeded, it will throw an RuntimeException.

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds if external command did not return.
        commandArguments - External command and arguments
        Returns:
        A list of all output from the external program.
        Throws:
        ProcessUtils.TimeoutException - - if timeout >=0 and has reached it.

      • run

        public static List<String> run(String... commandArguments)
        Run an external command and read STDOUT and STDERR from the sub-process and return the output as List of String.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        Parameters:
        commandArguments - External command and arguments
        Returns:
        List of output strings if command is successfully. Null if timeout reached.

      • runJava

        public static List<String> runJava(long timeout,
                   String... javaCmdArgs)
        Execute a java command that use same classpath that started it's original process.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in millis if external command did not return.
        javaCmdArgs - Arguments to the java command.
        Returns:
        List of output strings.

      • runJavaWithOpts

        public static List<String> runJavaWithOpts(long timeout,
                           String[] javaOpts,
                           String[] javaCmdArgs)
        Execute a java command that use same classpath that started it's original process, with additional user JAVA_OPTS array values.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds if external command did not return.
        javaOpts - Arguments to the java options. It can be null to mean not set any.
        javaCmdArgs - Arguments to the java command.
        Returns:
        List of output strings.

      • runJavaWithOpts

        public static int runJavaWithOpts(long timeout,
                  String[] javaOpts,
                  String[] javaCmdArgs,
                  ProcessUtils.LineAction lineAction)
        Execute a java command that use same classpath that started it's original process, with additional user JAVA_OPTS array values.

        This method will block caller until command is done, or timeout is up (if set that is.)

        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds if external command did not return.
        lineAction - a action object to process each line.
        javaOpts - Arguments to the java options. It can be null to mean not set any.
        javaCmdArgs - Arguments to the java command.
        Returns:
        exitCode - the Java (JVM) exit code if it completed successfully.
        Throws:
        ProcessUtils.TimeoutException - - if timeout >=0 and has reached it.

      • getOsType

        public static ProcessUtils.EOSType getOsType()
        Returns:
        A enum value for OS name.

      • getOsName

        public static String getOsName()
        Returns:
        Get the system Operating System name from sys prop: "os.name".
